primary.name: imagepreprocessing
primary.description: A small library for speeding up the dataset preparation and model testing steps for deep learning on various frameworks.

primary.name: Deep predictor
primary.description: A simple backend for image prediction tasks that uses deep learning.

primary.name: Quickshot
primary.description: A simple, quick, customizable screenshot tool.

primary.name: Telegram YouTube downloader
primary.description: Telegram bot for downloading and sending YouTube videos.

primary.name: weather
primary.description: Simple weather application written in vanilla JavaScript, it uses openweathermap api.

primary.name: exchange
primary.description: Simple exchange rates application written in vanilla JavaScript, it uses exchangerate api.

primary.name: Keyboard macro
primary.description: Multi purpose keyboard macro, you can add delays between your keystrokes or you can export your macro to a file and import it for later use.

primary.name: Log analyzer
primary.description: Finds top repeating patterns on huge files really fast, uses specialized binary search and horspool algorithm to speed up process.

primary.name: cvf article bot
primary.description: Finds cv articles from cvf site by given words or word groups, it can download articles to separate folders which named by conference name.

primary.name: iett bot
primary.description: Pulls and filters bus times from iett site for Istanbul, easy to integrate to telegram bots or mail clients.

secondary.name: Image warper
secondary.description: Warps images to wanted shape using homography.

secondary.name: Background subtractor
secondary.description: Uses median method to subtract the background of images.

secondary.name: Offsite finder
secondary.description: Finds metric distance between two points on images, uses homography to warp images.

secondary.name: keylogger
secondary.description: Sends logged keys as mail if provided file size exceeded or provided time limit reached.

secondary.name: image cropping tool
secondary.description: Image cropping tool for cropping a lot of images fast.

secondary.name: Bear game
secondary.description: Simple infinite runner game created purely because of boredom.

secondary.name: LinkedList
secondary.description: c++ linked list implementation with templates.

secondary.name: Gas detector
secondary.description: Arduino gas detector with adjustable threshold, it alerts and changes led color if gas presents.

secondary.name: Rc car
secondary.description: Arduino rc car usable with tv remote.
